# Arham Animal Ambulance

> India's largest free animal ambulance network providing 24/7 emergency rescue, treatment, and rehabilitation for injured street animals across 40+ cities. Operated by Arham Yuva Seva Group (AYSG), inspired by Param Gurudev Shree Namramuni Maharaj Saheb.

Arham Animal Ambulance, branded as "Always Care," operates 43+ fully-equipped ambulances with trained veterinarians and paravets dispatched free of charge around the clock. The organization also runs 4 free animal clinics and has 1 animal hospital under construction.

- 1.5 lakh+ (150,000+) animals rescued and treated in the last 3 years
- 75+ veterinarians and paravets on ground
- 100% free care — no animal turned away, no bill presented
- Headquartered in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India
- Services: emergency rescue, on-site first aid, wound treatment, surgery, post-operative rehabilitation
- Animals served: injured, stray, and abandoned street animals (dogs, cats, cows, birds, and more)
- Tax benefits: donations eligible for 80G tax exemption under Indian law

## Pages

- [Home — Find Nearest Ambulance](https://alwayscare.org/): Interactive map with live GPS tracking of ambulances across India, live rescue case feed, donation widget, ambulance finder by city
- [Live Impact — Rescue Case Tracker](https://alwayscare.org/live-impact): Real-time database of 700+ rescue cases with search, filter, and detailed case information including treatment details
- [Privacy Policy](https://alwayscare.org/privacy-policy)
- [Terms & Conditions](https://alwayscare.org/terms-conditions)
- [Refund & Cancellation](https://alwayscare.org/refund-cancellation)

## Cities We Serve

- **Gujarat:** Ahmedabad, Bhavnagar, Gondal, Junagadh, Madiya Hatina, Mandvi (Kutch), Palitana, Surat (Vesu, Varachha), Vadodara, Veraval, Jamnagar
- **Maharashtra:** Mumbai (Andheri, Malad, Mira Road, Ghatkopar, Mulund, Kandivali, Dadar, Nasik Highway), Nagpur, Pune (PMC, PCMC)
- **Other States:** Delhi, Chennai, Hyderabad, Indore
- **NGO Partners:** Bengaluru, Kolkata, Wadala, Rajkot, Vapi

## Contact

- Website: https://alwayscare.org
- Email: support@alwayscare.org
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/arhamanimalambulance/
- Parent Organization: Arham Yuva Seva Group (AYSG)
- Location: Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India
- Languages: English, Hindi, Gujarati
